title: xxx - Is this an obscure Futura?
content:
I thought it was Futura at first, but the C and the ascender on the h aren't right... and it's not condensed enough to be Adobe Futura condensed.

Any ideas?

Steve

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820120338im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image001_4280.jpg)
author: buddhaboy

comments.content:
This is definitely a Futura of some sort (maybe even Twentieth Century). It would be easy enough to shorten the 'h'.

- Lex
Yeah, I redrew it in the end... it's a stretched out Futura condensed with the h chopped... Thanks for replying anyway :)
